body.p: Pausing a VM suspends all the processes running on the VM.

To pause a VM:
Open the Machines tool in , and select the running VM you want to pause.
Right-click the VM name, or open the Machine menu, and choose Pause.
To start a paused VM running again:
Open the Machines tool in , and select the paused VM.
Right-click the VM name, or open the Machine menu, and choose Pause.
The VM starts running again.
